property.name: name
property.doc: The name of your application. This will also be the namespace for your views, controllers models and stores. Don't use spaces or special characters in the name.

property.name: controllers
property.doc: Names of controllers that the app uses.

property.name: scope
property.doc: The scope to execute the launch function in.

property.name: enableQuickTips
property.doc: True to automatically set up Ext.tip.QuickTip support.

property.name: appFolder
property.doc: The path to the directory which contains all application's classes. This path will be registered via {@link Ext.Loader#setPath} for the namespace specified in the {@link #name name} config.

property.name: appProperty
namespaces
autoCreateViewport
property.doc: True to automatically load and instantiate AppName.view.Viewport before firing the launch function.

property.name: path
property.doc: Additional load paths to add to Ext.Loader. See {@link Ext.Loader#paths} config for more details.

property.name: launch
